title: Kamen Rider The First
alternative_title: 漫画版 仮面ライダー THE FIRST ; Kamen Raidā Za Fāsuto ; Masked Rider The First
status: 漫画版 仮面ライダー THE FIRST ; Kamen Raidā Za Fāsuto ; Masked Rider The First
description:
Description :
        Manga adaptation of the film by Tetsuya Egawa. Controversial due to its poor quality.  
Egawa received a permanent contract dissolution from Toei after the first chapter came out.
